name: New Worlds (Demo)
description:
New Worlds is a game that I started making for my best friend's birthday. The demo isn't very long, but it gives an idea of the story and where I plan to go with it.

You play as Emily (my best friend) who finds herself in a strange new world. She finds Angel (me) and the two begin looking for a way home, as well as an answer to how they got there in the first place.
